text: Patrick Aaltonen (, born March 18, 1994), simply known as Pate, is a Finnish- Thai professional footballer who plays as a Defender. ==Personal life== Aaltonen was born in Raisio. His father is Finnish and his mother is Thai. ==Club career== Patrick Aaltonen began his career in 2011 playing for FC Honka in Finland. Ubon UMT United bought him in 2015. At the 2015 season he played well and the club promoted to the Thai Division 1 League. Fall 2016 Aaltonen returned to FC Honka in Kakkonen. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;FC Honka * Finnish Cup 16px Winners (1): 2012 ;Ubon UMT United * Regional League Division 2 16px Champions (1): 2015 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:People from Raisio Category:Finnish people of Thai descent Category:Thai people of Finnish descent Category:Finnish footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Pallohonka players Category:HIFK Fotboll players Category:FC Honka players Category:Ubon United F.C. players Category:IF Gnistan players Category:PTT Rayong F.C. players Category:Ykkönen players Category:Kakkonen players Category:Veikkausliiga players Category:Thai League 2 players Category:Finnish expatriate footballers Category:Finnish expatriate sportspeople in Thailand Category:Expatriate footballers in Thailand Category:Finland youth international footballers Category:Thai expatriate sportspeople in Finland
title: Patrick Aaltonen
